biography: Anders, a name synonymous with dedication at Vihti Golf Club, is known for his calm demeanor on the course, a stark contrast to the intense focus he brings to each swing. While some might see golf as a leisurely pursuit, Anders approaches it with the precision of a seasoned strategist, always calculating his next move with thoughtful consideration.

Having graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on one occasion, Anders has proven himself to be a fierce competitor. Although he is considered retired from Hector events, his passion for the game remains undiminished. Anders will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, but a last-minute change of heart is always a possibility for a player of Anders' caliber.
